title: Microsoft founder Bill Gates uses a Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 instead of a Surface Duo
content:
During a Reddit AMA this week, Microsoft’s founder Bill Gates revealed he uses an Android phone with a big canvas, but it isn’t Microsoft’s own Surface Duo. Instead, Bill Gates uses a Galaxy Z Fold 3 as his daily smartphone.

more…

The post Microsoft founder Bill Gates uses a Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3 instead of a Surface Duo appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In a recent Reddit AMA, Microsoft founder Bill Gates confirmed he uses a Galaxy Z Fold 3 as his daily smartphone.
